# Notebooks evaluation

## Global evaluation

### DUACS 

- SSH evaluation with independant nadir: [ssh_scores_DUACS_geos.ipynb](../gallery/ssh_scores_DUACS_geos.ipynb)
- (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: [uv_scores_DUACS_geos.ipynb](../gallery/uv_scores_DUACS_geos.ipynb)

### MIOST

- SSH evaluation with independant nadir: [ssh_scores_MIOST_geos.ipynb](../gallery/ssh_scores_MIOST_geos.ipynb)
- (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: [uv_scores_MIOST_geos.ipynb](../gallery/uv_scores_MIOST_geos.ipynb)


### MIOST w/ EW

- SSH evaluation with independant nadir: [ssh_scores_MIOST_geos_barotrop_eqwaves.ipynb](../gallery/ssh_scores_MIOST_geos_barotrop_eqwaves.ipynb)
- (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: [uv_scores_MIOST_geos_barotrop_eqwaves.ipynb](../gallery/uv_scores_MIOST_geos_barotrop_eqwaves.ipynb)

## Gulf Stream evaluation

### DUACS

- SSH evaluation with independant nadir: [ssh_scores_DUACS_geos_GS.ipynb](../gallery/ssh_scores_DUACS_geos_GS.ipynb)
- (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: [uv_scores_DUACS_geos_GS.ipynb](../gallery/uv_scores_DUACS_geos_GS.ipynb)
